tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
  username VARCHAR(50),
  achievements VARCHAR(100),
  stats VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE stats (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    games_played INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    stat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    matches_played INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_profile (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  total_achievements INT,
  total_stats INT
)

CREATE TABLE achievements (
  achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profile(player_id),
  achievement_name VARCHAR(100),
  achievement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE stats (
  stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profile(player_id),
  stat_name VARCHAR(100),
  stat_value INT
)

CREATE TABLE achievements_stats (
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profile(player_id),
  achievement_id INT REFERENCES achievements(achievement_id),
  stat_id INT REFERENCES stats(stat_id)
)

CREATE TABLE player_friends (
  friend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profile(player_id),
  friend_username VARCHAR(50)
)
